subject: Damping spacers
description_text:
Hello, day 6 November I purchased from your Aliexpress store a set of pedals plus x p3 h3 in the box, everything is present except the 13 Damping Spacers washers, it is possible to have them, since they are part of the accessory kit supplied, here is the purchase ID on Aliexpress 3063765195122186, waiting for your answer, thank you in advance.

Inviato da Outlook per Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Antonio Laudani,  Your product has been shipped. The logistics number is:YT2533901400330693. You can track it at this website:https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=YT2533901400330693
